name: Void & Nothingness
description:
Void & Nothingness follows one day of the life of a young women making ends meet while living in Manhattan. One evening she has an encounter she will not forget for the rest of her life....

This is 'kinetic' visual novel, which means it's a linear story without choices and jumps. It is a collaboration between Milan Kazarka of Vysoko Anime Production and Ludmila Sosa, who did the artwork.
